name: Manufactoria
summary: Manufactoria is a puzzle game about putting robots in their proper place. Use conveyor-belts, 'pullers' and 'pushers' to build a machine that will work no matter what gets thrown at it!
info:
• 游戏类型: Puzzle
  • 游戏引擎: Flash
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 官方网站: http://pleasingfungus.com/Manufactoria/
